text:
The APR based Apache Tomcat Native library which allows optimal performance in production environments was not found on the java.library.path: C:\Program Files\Apache Software Foundation\Tomcat 7.0\bin; ......
while tcnative-1.dll version 1.1.22 is in C:\Program Files\Apache Software Foundation\Tomcat 7.0\bin directory.
But it locates tcnative-1.dll version 1.1.20 and recommends to replace the APR library for version 1.1.22 at minimum.
creator: basilk@obninsk.com
rpluem@apache.org
text: Bugzilla is no user support forum. Please post this question to the Tomcat users list.
